overview_of_class:
Led by faculty based at both the School of the Art Institute Chicago (SAIC) and Northwestern University. Students will establish a critical dialogue about information visualization across multiple disciplines, and engage in collaborative research on information visualization using existing data sets.

This course is open to any Northwestern undergraduate student and graduate student by permission of instructors.
name: Data as Art
title: MEAS DSGN 375-0-1 Data as Art
enrl_requirement: Enrollment Requirements: REASON: Pre-registration is not allowed for this class. Please try again during regular registration.
